mapper.select: SELECT id, account_id, delivery_id, total_price, used, payment_status, created_at, updated_at FROM orders
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (account_id, delivery_id, total_price, used, payment_status) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{deliveryId}, #{totalPrice}, #{used}, #{paymentStatus})
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET account_id = #{accountId}, delivery_id = #{deliveryId}, total_price = #{totalPrice}, used = #{used}, payment_status = #{paymentStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
